mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (username, password, email, name, created_date, updated_date) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, #{email}, #{name}, #{createdDate}, #{updatedDate})
mapper.select: SELECT id, username, password, email, name, created_date AS createdDate, updated_date AS updatedDate FROM users WHERE username = #{username}
SELECT id, username, password, email, name, created_date AS createdDate, updated_date AS updatedDate FROM users WHERE id = #{id}
